subject: Football
Grass
Stadiums and Arenas
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: For about the past 25 years, the N.F.L. has replaced the entire field for Super Bowls played on natural grass, ensuring pristine conditions for the game.
snippet: For about the past 25 years, the N.F.L. has replaced the entire field for Super Bowls played on natural grass, ensuring pristine conditions for the game.
